en.title: Watch FusionExcel Master Yap's Interview On Philippines RHTV!
en.content:
FE's Consultant Master Yap was interviewed by Philippines RHTV on 15th August 2009. The interview generated a lot of interest on FE's Scalar Energy products!

Here Are The Youtube Links:

1) Master Yap's Iinterview on Philippines RHTV (Part 1 of 3).

2) Master Yap's Interview on Philippines RHTV (Part 2 of 3).

3) Master Yap's Interview on Philippines RHTV (Part 3 of 3).
